title: Justice Department Disbands National Cryptocurrency Enforcement Team
summary: The Trump Administration's Justice Department, led by Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche, disbanded the National Cryptocurrency Enforcement Team (NCET), effectively ending federal prosecutorial oversight of complex crypto-related financial crimes. The move represents a significant deregulation of the digital asset sector, shifting enforcement focus away from systemic crypto-related financial investigations.
description: The Justice Department officially disbanded its National Cryptocurrency Enforcement Team (NCET), ending systematic federal oversight of complex crypto-related financial crimes.

sources.title: Justice Department will disband its team focused on cryptocurrency crimes
US Justice Dept Disbands Crypto Enforcement Team, Citing Trump Order

notes: Event demonstrates systematic weakening of financial regulatory oversight
